alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:30AM AKST until January 01 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Northern Panhandle to Start the New Year with More Snow... A band of moisture will move northward over the northern half of the panhandle. This will bring light to moderate snow fall to area Saturday night and Sunday. Colder air is persisting over the northern Lynn Canal area and along the Haines and Klondike Highways. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates expected after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
